duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing and maintaining strong client and candidate relationships to drive business growth and success.
Identifying and pursuing new business development opportunities, including staff augmentation and contract positions.
Utilizing expertise in both sales and delivery to effectively manage the recruitment process from start to finish.
Making continuous business decisions and demonstrating a high level of self-direction and initiative in day-to-day activities.
Building and nurturing a community of established and successful recruitment professionals through collaboration and networking.
Empowering oneself and others to achieve greatness and success in the recruitment industry.
Working from home 100% while maintaining a high level of professionalism, business savvy, and positive energy.
Earning uncapped commissions and envisioning retirement through the creation of a stable and scalable recruitment business.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2+ years experience in recruitment agency environment, ideally 5+ years recruiting
